articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed ahead of Japan's BOJ decision and South Korea inflation this week - CNBC
articles.description: Asian markets are mixed as investors brace for key economic data later this week, including purchasing managers index from around the region
articles.content:
Bitcoin is on pace to post its best week since June, after a big rally earlier this week pushed it out of the narrow range it had been stuck in for much of this year.
